books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Eva and Gideon's love is threatened by old wounds; a Crossfire novel.
books.name: CAPTIVATED BY YOU

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: John Puller, a special agent with the Army, hunts for his brother, who was convicted of treason and has escaped from prison.
books.name: THE ESCAPE

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A downsized Wall Street lawyer joins a legal clinic in a small Virginia town, and becomes involved both in real people’s lives and in litigation against the coal mining industry.
books.name: GRAY MOUNTAIN

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: The Los Angeles detective Harry Bosch and his new partner investigate two long-unsolved cases.
books.name: THE BURNING ROOM

books.author: by Mary Higgins Clark and Alafair Burke
books.description: A TV producer plans a show about a cold case — the murder of a U.C.L.A. student who was found with one shoe missing.
books.name: THE CINDERELLA MURDER

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: The continuing relationship over five decades between a disgraced clergyman and a drug-addicted musician whom he mentored as a boy.
books.name: REVIVAL

books.author: by Janet Evanovich and Lee Goldberg
books.description: The F.B.I. special agent Kate O’Hare works with Nicolas Fox, a handsome con man, to pursue a drug kingpin.
books.name: THE JOB

books.author: by Richard Paul Evans
books.description: A divorced woman enters into a contract with a strange man to pretend to be a couple until Christmas.
books.name: THE MISTLETOE PROMISE

books.author: by Patricia Cornwell
books.description: As the Boston Marathon trial approaches, Dr. Kay Scarpetta, the chief medical examiner for the state of Massachusetts, pursues a sniper who may be a vigilante; the 22nd Scarpetta novel.
books.name: FLESH AND BLOOD

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: After searching for her mother, who has disappeared, for more than 10 years, a woman employs a psychic and a private detective.
books.name: LEAVING TIME

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: In County Mayo, evil and witchcraft complicate a long-simmering romance; Book 3 of the Cousins O’Dwyer trilogy.
books.name: BLOOD MAGICK

books.author: by Douglas Preston and Lincoln Child
books.description: Special Agent Aloysius Pendergast is stalked by a killer bent on vengeance.
books.name: BLUE LABYRINTH

books.author: by Melanie Marchande
books.description: Megan's difficult boss is also the author of the romance novels she reads in private.
books.name: HIS SECRETARY
